name: Cat/Cow
description: On hands and knees, alternate between curving the back/pelvis upward (like an angry cat) and curving them downward, stretching the muscles of the hips, back, abdomen, chest, and lungs
benefits: Tones the gastrointestinal tract and muscles surrounding the female reproductive system, helps relieve stress from menstrual cramps, lower back pain and sciatica

name: Plank
description: On hands and toes in the push-up position, tighten abs, glutes, and muscles in the back and legs
benefits: Tones and strengthens the core for healthy posture, balance and coordination

audio.name: Bridge
audio.description: On back with feet flat on mat, bring knees up and extend navel towards the ceiling
audio.benefits: A gentle start to spine extensions, improving the mobility of the spine and countering the effects of too much sitting

audio.name: Sukhasana
audio.description: Seated with legs crossed, shoulders and head relaxed, hands on knees, focus on deep, even breath
audio.benefits: Improves concentration, flexibility of lower extremeties, including hips, and stability

audio.name: Tree
audio.description: Standing on one foot, balance and develop stablity with the core and connection with the earth
audio.benefits: helps improve posture and provides stability to the pelvis, srengthening the ankles and legs, elongating the spine and improving flexibity and balance

audio.name: Chair
audio.description: Stand and squat into a position as if seated in a chair
audio.benefits: Strengthens the ankles, thighs, calves, and spine, stretches shoulders and chest, stimulates the abdominal organs, diaphragm and heart

audio.name: Extended Side Angle
audio.description: Standing and twisting with feet apart, lean toward one knee, then the other
audio.benefits: Stretches and strengthens the legs, knees, and ankles, increases stamina and stimulates the abdominal organs, as well as increasing physical balance

audio.name: Lotus
audio.description: Laying on belly, raise head and chest, and feet and legs off of the mat
audio.benefits: Imporoves function of intestine and appetite, strengthens the thighs and abdominal muscles, and improves blood supply to lower back muscles
audio.name: Locust
Downward Facing Dog
audio.description: On hands and knees, push hips up
audio.benefits: Helps calm the mind, relieve stress as well as energize the body, stretching the shoulders, hamstrings, calves, arches, and hands

audio.name: Cobra
audio.description: From belly, gently bring the chest up
audio.benefits: Increases the mobility of the spine, strenghtens spinal support muscles, and helps relieve back pain, opens the chest and front of the body
